CustomField.formula:
IMAGE(CASE( Patient_Criticality__c , "High", "/img/samples/color_red.gif", "Medium", "/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "/img/samples/color_green.gif"), "Criticality Indicator", 20, 100)
/*IF( Case_Age__c > 20, IMAGE("/img/samples/color_red.gif", "red", 30, 30), IF( Case_Age__c > 10, IMAGE("/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "yellow", 30, 30), IMAGE("/img/samples/color_green.gif", "green", 30, 30) ))*/
CustomField.label: Patient Criticality Indiacator
